description:
Newly renovated apartment with a comfy full sized bed and 2 sofa bed available on 128th St in West Harlem! The unit is fully furnished with a full sized beds, 2 sofa bed, table, chairs, cableTV, wifi and has a full fridge, stove, and microwave and dish washer!

 It's completely renovated throughout, and has beautiful flood lighting and exposed brick! The entire unit is yours during your stay. It's a fully furnished apartment that can hold up to 5 people.

Newly renovated hidden sanctuary with a comfy full sized bed available Harlem! The unit is fully furnished with a full sized bed and 2 sofa beds, table, chairs, cableTV, wifi and has a full fridge, stove, and microwave.


The unit has high ceilings, a completed renovation throughout, beautiful flood lighting and exposed brick!

Best part, total seclusion. You share with no one! The entire unit is yours during your stay. 

It's a fully furnished apartment that can hold up to 5 people.

CableTV, Wifi,

My assistant will meet you for check in and gives you a tour and keys. If you are checking in with lockbox, you will get her contact information.

The neighborhood of central Harlem is very diverse and full of culture! We are a few blocks from Historic 125th Street, The Apollo Theatre, The Schomburg museum, Sylvia's Restaurant, and many other attractions!

The 2,3 trains are a few blocks away for an easy commute anywhere in the city! 15 minutes to midtown!!!! 

The ABCD on St. Nicholas Ave and  4,5,6 trains on Lexington Ave are about 6 minutes  by walking

This is a prime location for transit! Everything is right there!!!!
name: The Treetop Escapes
